txt.en: Raise heraldry of the High King in Arandor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should place heraldry of the High King in Arandor to intimidate the Enemy and boost the spirits of the soldiers.

'This land will never possess the beauty of Belfalas, my home. Still, I have lived here for...'

Eärtur pauses a moment.

'...seven years now? Can it really be so? Perhaps a boost of our spirits is needed, and even better if we might strike fear into the hearts of our enemies at the same time! Take this heraldry of High King Elendil and plant it throughout the Kingsland of Arandor. May it bring strength to our fellows, and drain the courage from our foes!'
Raised heraldry of the High King ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Eärtur, the Prince of Belfalas, seeks to plant the heraldry of the High King throughout Arandor.
Eärtur can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should talk to Eärtur.
'I see the banners of the High King waving, even from afar. Perhaps the winds are changing, and the siege will soon be over. Can you feel it too?'
